name: Coin Upside Down
description:
Context :

Your house is far from any other.
After a spring clean, you realize that you are bored.
In order to stop this boring life, you have decided to get noticed by making the most noise.
You find out that coins multiplie the noise you make but you need to flip them when they are red so that you can take them.
Time to put all upside down !

Theme : The other side of the coin

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Coin Upside Down is a game where you have 2 minutes to make as much noise as possible by grabbing and kicking some objects in your house. Get extra time by picking up coin, which are pickable only on the gold side (kick it to revert it).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls :

[WSAD | ZQSD] -> Move
[Mouse] -> Aim
[Space] -> Jump
[Mouse1] -> Grab/Drop
[Mouse2] -> Kick/Throw
[E] -> Open/Close door
[Echap | P] -> Pause/Resume

There are 8 coins, do you feel able to find them all ?
